## {{< fa envelope-open-text >}}  Contact & Engagement

<br> Start with a brief — we’ll reply with a concise proposal.

Overview: We offer workshops, short projects and retained advisory. Engagements are scoped to outcomes, timelines and available capacity.

We can help you with:

-   {{< fa angle-double-right >}} **How to start** — Send a short brief with objectives, audience, timeline and constraints.  
	![How to start](https://picsum.photos/seed/contact/400/250){width="400" height="250"}

-   {{< fa angle-double-right >}} **Preferred delivery format** — Tell us the preferred delivery format (workshop, pilot project, retainer).  
	![Formats](https://picsum.photos/seed/formats/400/250){width="400" height="250"}

-   {{< fa angle-double-right >}} **Compliance & constraints** — Share any compliance or data constraints up front.  
	![Compliance](https://picsum.photos/seed/compliance/400/250){width="400" height="250"}

<br>

What we deliver in response:

-   {{< fa angle-double-right >}} **Concise proposal** — Scope, deliverables, timeline and budget estimate.
-   {{< fa angle-double-right >}} **Suggested next steps** — Available dates and follow-up options.

For urgent requests, include preferred dates and we will propose a compressed timeline if capacity allows.
